course.subject: LANG
course.name: Critical Reading and Writing in Chinese
course.description: This course targets students who enter HKUST with a good command of the Chinese Language and who wish to raise their proficiency level in reading and writing. The focus of this course is on critical reading and higher-order thinking skills, leading on to the production of written texts which demonstrate clarity of thought and sophisticated use of the Chinese Language. Students’ learning experience is enhanced by a range of classroom and outside-class activities involving them in reading, critiquing, researching and writing tasks.
course.prerequisites: Level 4 or above in HKDSE Chinese OR Score 100 or above in JEE Chinese
course.exclusions: LANG 1120, LANG 1121, LANG 1122, LANG 1123, LANG 1124, LANG 1125, LANG 1126, LANG 1127

reviews.author: EACN
reviews.comment_content:
三個assignment
第一個係讀四篇文章然後堂上即席作文（類似讀後感，not exactly係），邊篇文章係上堂先知
第二個分組做創業計劃書，除左獻辭其他都係簡單野，唔使修辭文筆好果啲（有梗係bonus）
第三個係寫研討會論文，3000字，同通識IES有少少似（純粹個人覺得，最尾無出分，唔清楚呢個思路係咪正確）
reviews.comment_teaching:
廣東話班，全部講廣東話說
老師夠貼地，同好肯俾指導，好人！
雖然下年好似改制唔分1114同1115，但reg到Esther唔好放手！
好人又好grade
reviews.comment_grading:
第一份555
第二份555
第三份無出分
Final Grade: B+

Esther講過對佢黎講4算係最低，極少俾3
所以覺得個grade都算fair
reviews.comment_workload:
適合鍾意寫多過講既人
第一篇之前prep定唔難
第二篇分組做workload其實好細
第三篇寫3000字，但其實連埋搵資料寫夠字數唔難
Attendance好似都係最多走5堂

reviews.author: chimz
reviews.comment_content:
為各項評估而教，如果作文想達到創作嘅地步，千祈唔好讀呢科，呢科同考文憑試無大分別，行鋼線難保證好龜。
D唔係因為老師唔好，係成個課程對於中文修養無咩幫助。
reviews.comment_teaching:
老師夠貼地,夠chill
呢班係廣東話班，即係老師+同學都係講廣東話
reviews.comment_grading:
起標價: straight 5
合格分數: straight 4

My Case:
評估一: 6,5,5
評估二: 6,5,4
評估三: hea do
--> final grade: A-
reviews.comment_workload:
第5週: 堂上作文評估 (20%)，回應指定篇章，圍繞主題寫作，限時80分鐘，文章會一個禮拜前上載到canvas，俾大家準備。
第9週: 小組企劃書 (30% - 全組同分)，包括獻辭、創業內容、新聞稿、自介
第13週: 學術文章 (40%)
平時分 (10%): 包出勤、幾個ad hoc task

reviews.author: Yandsam
reviews.comment_content: 初初揀呢個course係因為唔想講咁多野，而且1115成日都要present又要拍片辯論對我嚟講太chur。上堂多數都係一齊討論文章，答下問題。但始終我本身唔係鍾意寫作，所以感覺係為左fulfil requirement而讀。
reviews.comment_teaching: 因為呢班係reading&writing，所以esther俾我地講廣東話，但佢自己就堅持講普通話。感覺上成個course最學到野係教說明文嗰幾堂，但之後篇essay其實教完好似冇教咁，淨係講左格式，最後都係要靠自己。
reviews.comment_grading:
雖然Esther係coordinator，但係佢俾分好鬆手，一開始佢已經講最低分都只係B range。

評估一(20%)係即堂作篇800字嘅文推介一篇主題散文，之前會俾四篇散文你返去睇，到嗰日抽一篇嚟寫。不過前兩堂會一齊討論嗰四篇文，而且要用嚟評估嗰篇會講得深入d。雖然我寫到一塌糊塗，但最後三個分都有4/7。

評估二(30%)係小組創業計劃書，每人寫一part(~1000-1200字)，大多數都係說明文，除左獻辭之外其他都唔洗點用腦寫d矯情嘅內容。基本上都會拎5-6分。

評估三(40%)係研討會論文(3500字)，每組會有一個大題目，之後自己訂論文題目。有兩堂會用嚟俾每組講下題目、研究方向、搵左咩資料等等。之後就optional上堂問佢意見，完sem交文。

基本上我都係hea做，最尾篇essay仲要喺臨deadline前求其總結就交，但最後都有B+。
reviews.comment_workload: 每個禮拜睇一兩篇文，上堂都會再俾時間睇。除左最尾篇essay要花多d時間之外，其他都比較輕鬆。

reviews.author: 呀欣
reviews.comment_content: 佢分左三個主題，第一係國際文化筆會:主題閱讀與主題書寫，主要係叫你睇幾頁紙，唔係書，之後比感想同埋點解推介人去睇，記得要講佢比其他同類文好在邊到。第二係創業計劃:走向社會，主要係學寫唔同格式的文，例如：獻辭、新聞稿等，視乎你係小組入面選擇做咩職位（最好寫係揀啲網上多範例抄嘅，例如：獻辭、新聞稿）。第三係面向世界:二十一世紀環球視野，主要係做一啲環球性嘅議題如：性別，教育等，就著這些議題寫論文，冇點教論文格式，主要自己上網搵，同埋reference 係要寫，但都係唔教自己上網搵，其實有啲似中學ies。總括黎講就係作野作野同作野。
reviews.comment_teaching: 上堂多數會叫你分組討論，會有啲過時鏗鏘集比你睇黎擴闊思維。但覺得冇點教做果幾份評估。上完同冇上冇分別。
reviews.comment_grading:
好grade，基本上三個評估都係分做內容
組織結構同文字表達三部分每個1-7級去計分，7係最高，第一個評估係4,5,5,之後果兩個唔知，但最後A−
reviews.comment_workload: 有三份評估，第一份係堂上做推介小文一則（800字），有幾篇文會比你事先係屋企準備，上堂抽一篇黎做，佔總分20％。第二份小組做一份創業計劃書，30%，第三份係個人寫一篇研討會論文，2000-2500字，40%，仲有10%平時分。

reviews.author: Sandra Tung
reviews.title: Good grade course if you like writing essay
reviews.comment_content: The content is relatively typical with considerable amount of Chinese readings you need to go through. The materials are not very interesting and it doesn't mean that you will not score high if you didn't read through them before class. The materials are just to be inclusive and encourage students to speak up in class.
reviews.comment_teaching: Although this Chinese language course only focuses on writing skills, instructor encourages students in class to speak up in Putonghua. However, participation would be counted simply judging your ability to speak up.
reviews.comment_grading: As long as you demonstrated strong analytical skills and put in effort to search for relevant information and articles about your topic. The task wasn't difficult for you to score high yet you just need a considerable amount of time gathering sources and reference materials.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is relatively heavier than Chinese speaking class As you need to write 4000 works essays as an end-of-course assignment for instructor to give you a final grade. Your course grade is heavily judged by how good you're writing the essay.

reviews.author: kero星人
reviews.comment_content:
同其他review一樣。唔覺學咗d乜。
不過主要實用文嘅嘢，mainland會太花巧冇用武之地
reviews.comment_teaching:
比較正經教書嘅女老師，上堂唔好預有gag。
不過有問題佢會耐心答，deadline有計傾，好好人：）
reviews.comment_grading:
唔錯
2nd task要搵唔freeride ge groupmate。1000-1500 words per person
3rd task 3500 words

scores=> slightly lower than lang1002/1003, but grading is about the same or even better :)
reviews.comment_workload: 3rd task 3500字其實幾多，要早d開始做

reviews.author: grqm
reviews.comment_content:
Don't really remember anything taught in this course, except for the three writing tasks.

Task 1:  800-word essay recommendation, done in class
Task 2:  business proposal, group of 5, each would write ~1000 words
Task 3:  3500-word "conference paper"

The best thing about the course is that you don't have to speak during class so it's perfect for people who don't talk much.
reviews.comment_teaching: Quite good. Very articulate. Though sometimes tedious because of the course content. Also, he taught in Cantonese, which is awesome.
reviews.comment_grading:
Here's my grades in the the first two tasks:

Task 1: 6, 5, 5, slightly above mean I guess
Task 2: 5, 5, 4, around mean

Didn't prepare for the first writing task and the business proposal was done in a hurry. Don't know what I got for the third task.

Grade: A-

Grading seems fair.
reviews.comment_workload: No workload whatsoever apart from class attendance. Some required reading but that you can always do in class. Even the third task can be done within two days.

reviews.author: CLee
reviews.comment_content:
參與分(課堂表現及出勤率) (10%)
評估一 (寫作 文章推介) (20%) [第五週]
評估二 (小組作業 專題寫作) (30%) [第八週]
評估三 (專題寫作 研討會論文) (40%) [第十三週]
reviews.comment_teaching: 幾好人，評估一之前個堂會講下個四篇文章。交評估二之前上堂又會俾時間同自己個組傾下。
reviews.comment_grading: 一般
reviews.comment_workload:
上堂好多時都會睇文章之後分組講下意見。有時都會叫返屋企睇文，但等到上堂先睇都得。
評估一係堂上寫推介文章(800 字以上)
評估二係全組交一份創業計劃書(5000-6000字)
評估三係個人評估寫研討會論文(3500字以上)，要搵資料支持論點。

reviews.comment_content: Mainly 3 topics will be covered in the lessons. Not difficult and the professor won't ask you a lot of questions. The content is easy and not discussed deeply.
reviews.comment_teaching: A very good teacher who provides a lot of help to students. Clear instructions and explanations. She helps me a lot in writing the final essay, giving me lots of concrete suggestions.
reviews.comment_grading: Good grade. Most of the students can get B or above.
reviews.comment_workload: Not too much workload. Only 3 assignments have to be done. The second one is a group project which everyone only needs to write about 600 words. The final project has to write about 3500 words. But no midterm and final exam are required.

reviews.author: mmhwong
reviews.title: Good Grade
reviews.comment_content: both individual and group project with quizzes. lessons are quite relaxing because after half a lesson of lecture, the instructor will give time to discuss on the topic or even our group project.
reviews.comment_teaching: Putonghua speaking, but students can speak in cantonese.
reviews.comment_grading: nice and good grade. but i didnt attend all lessons so i think it is affected.
reviews.comment_workload: not too heavy but cannot miss more than 5 lessons. for me i nearly miss all of the lessons required, but luckily they will send you a reminder when you miss too many lessons.

reviews.author: Roddie
reviews.title: 閱讀與寫作
reviews.comment_content:
一共有三個部分
第一個係推介文 800字
第二個係創業計畫書 5000-6000字 五個人
第三個係研討會論文 3500字
reviews.comment_teaching: 講真，其實中文堂都好難教到野，因為語文哩家野都係語感同埋自己理解比較重要，但係有時候自己理解又驚會錯意。王岩老師上堂時候都幾鍾意叫人問答問題，如果唔係個堂會好dead air。上堂老師講普通話，但係我哋可以講普通話或者廣東話。
reviews.comment_grading:
10% participation
20% 推介文
30% 計畫書
40% 論文
淨係出咗兩個成績，推介文同埋計畫書，分別是655同埋555，論文冇出成績所以transparency唔高。
最後a-。
reviews.comment_workload: workload講真幾大，計畫書分工合作但係中文相對比較好嘅人如果想好grade最好自己proofread一下，以防萬一，proofread個會chur爆（proofread到4am喊出來）。如果唔想咁chur又想好grade就part埋mainland啦，我mainland嘅fd輕輕鬆鬆667真係wtf。研討會論文最chur，自己一個人寫3500字，仲要睇好多文。

reviews.author: ericac3204
reviews.comment_content: There are mainly three writing assessments. One of them is around 1000 words, and a 500 words introduction ( the introduction is a group work) . However, the grading has been changed recently.
reviews.comment_teaching: The instructor is quite nice and quite passionate at teaching.
reviews.comment_grading: The grading is quite good and at least reasonable. The marks of the assessments had never released and only a final grade was released when the semester ended.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is quite heavy, at least when you have not written long Chinese essay for a long time after the public examination.

reviews.author: HingZone
reviews.comment_content: 其他人有講 唔重複
reviews.comment_teaching:
教得好好 講作文好有heart 同你講有咩好 可以點改
做project guideline好清楚
上堂好輕鬆
reviews.comment_grading:
好好Grade
本身DSE中文level4
第一篇自已既文 (4 5 4)
之後做project part左兩個mainland :)
Final essay 認真做
Final Grade :A
reviews.comment_workload: 呢個老師無功課咁濟 係其他 instructor先有一兩份咁上下

reviews.author: Helffor
reviews.comment_content: Nothing special, but requires efforts.
reviews.comment_teaching: The instructors do not follow the book quite well. If there are any discrepancies, it is better to accomplish the assignment the way your instructor want you to do.
reviews.comment_grading: I think I have done well in the first two assignments, but the outcomes are just so-so. But I performed my best in the last assignment, which takes up the greatest percentage, and the final grade turned out to be rather satisfactory.
reviews.comment_workload: One on-class essay, one group presentation and one final essay.

reviews.author: fruitkse123
reviews.comment_content:
要買本中lang書，書中分3個單元，
內容關於閱讀、國際視野等

每星期有assigned reading，多是散文
睇完上堂討論同分析
有時要學生準備堂上present／介紹
reviews.comment_teaching: 人很好，上堂氣氛好好，中意問問題叫人答
reviews.comment_grading:
有3份assignments

第1份assignment係散文介紹  20%
800字堂上完成 考之前會叫你睇晒d文
（第1篇文 6 5 5）

第2份係group project 30%
內容係叫你寫創業計畫書，
4500字 5個人一組 每人寫一篇／一部分

Final essay 3000字 自己做 40%
會俾個議題你，再自己諗題目  

grade： A
reviews.comment_workload: 要睇文同作文，計attendance，workload不大

reviews.author: Keith5641
reviews.comment_content:
有講散文....講完散文叫你寫番篇介紹
第1個assignment  20% 800字堂上完成
仲有group project 30% 4500字 5個人一組
final essay 3000字 自己做 40%
reviews.comment_teaching:
教得幾好...講得都算清昕
睇得出佢上堂前係有備課既
reviews.comment_grading:
My Group A+, B, B , A, B+
第1個 assignment 18/21
其他無出分
最後A+...
reviews.comment_workload:
基本上每堂完左都有功課
通常叫你去搵下資料,寫下野咁

reviews.author: 濤
reviews.comment_content: 內容分3part,第一部份講推薦文章600-800字，第二部份講創業企劃書~3000字，第三部就分開唔同範講ge學術文章~3000字。不過個人認為內容有少少無聊。
reviews.comment_teaching:
用普通話教，不過都無咩問題ge，如果唔係完全唔識普通話都無咩問題。
PS依個instructor真心唔差，都幾nice，直接問要點作都會答你，重點係唔爛grade
reviews.comment_grading: 都算靚grade，第一篇文5 5 5 ，中間半頹，到最後都有A range，都算幾好
reviews.comment_workload: Workload唔算大，project有groupmate一齊做，唔算太辛苦，一個禮拜睇幾篇文都輕鬆，係最後個2-3個禮拜要作篇3000字左右ge文。平時都算無咩做。

reviews.author: Kenny Ng
reviews.comment_content:
3parts:
1.writing a "book review"
2.writing a fake business proposal
3.writing a "Thesis"(without actual research lol)
reviews.comment_teaching:
Teaching is fine overall but the course is conducted in Putonghua. =(
A bit boring at time but i believe its mostly because of the weak course content.
reviews.comment_grading: i believe most people got B range here, but if you are lucky/workhard enough you can get a A-/A.
reviews.comment_workload: Only the business proposal and "Thesis" is actual work. The book review is done on lesson. The workload is not much from this course unless you take attendance as a part of workload.

reviews.author: klchanat
reviews.title: LANG 1114
reviews.comment_content: 第一部分講主題閱讀，第二部分講創業報告，第三部分講不同的議題
reviews.comment_teaching: 感覺課堂上的功課沒有評分
reviews.comment_grading: 還可以，少給A range，普普通通都有B
reviews.comment_workload: 算輕鬆，只有三份project: 推介小文(有4篇文，堂上隨機抽1篇作推介)、創業報告書(分組)、研討會論文

reviews.author: oto
reviews.comment_content:
整個課程分三個部分，分別是: 主題閱讀、創業計劃和面向世界。

內容整體而言為實用方向，每部分最後均以評估作結以第一部分像是適應期，俾你睇返，寫返下中文。會有少少分組演講/示部分，但只佔參與分。

第一份是讀完幾篇範文，再堂上寫800字以上推介文章，不過頗難拿捏。

第二份是小組寫作5000字以上創業計劃書，有頗多時間討論，因此大家合作的話，每人600字左右不是問題。

第三份是3500字個人論文，我認為是最難做的評估，因為對課程少寫長文的人頗有難度，特別是主題為社會科學範疇的學問。
reviews.comment_teaching:
老師聲線響亮，教學生動，也很理解學生的處境，容許我們自由以廣東話或普通話溝通，令上課氣氛輕鬆。

另外，評分方面也頗為鬆手，全班的得分中上。
reviews.comment_grading:
堂上有內地學生，本地生的中文水平與他們相比的確被比下去，但以我觀察，大部分本地生的評估得分只是各項稍低約一至兩級，應該都可以取得B 左右。

參與分在於參與堂上討論(當傾計就可以) 或老師問你問題時嘗試回答就好。
reviews.comment_workload: 基本上沒甚麼功課要回去做，除了那兩個評估。READINGS不多，除了第一個評估的範文必讀以外，其他沒有規定，比起ENG LANG輕鬆。
